title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.47 - Joinder of parties; relief
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.47 - Joinder of parties; relief

State Regulations

All persons and entities alleged to have engaged in any
unfair labor practices may be joined as parties, whether jointly, severally, or
in the alternative, and a decision may be rendered against one or more of them, upon all of the evidence without regard to the party by or against whom such
evidence has been introduced. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.47

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
